snippet.title: Arctic Awakening - Gameplay Trailer (2023)
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275550/Arctic_Awakening/

Arctic Awakening is a first-person narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your court-mandated therapy robot for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the mysteries buried beneath the ice.

Coming soon to PC, Mac and game consoles.

Website: https://arcticawakening.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArcticAwakening
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoldFireStudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/goldfirestudios
Discord: https://discord.gg/goldfire
